TEXT.TITLE: HONEYBEE <HBE> SEES NO REASON FOR STOCK RISE
TEXT.BODY: Honeybee Inc said it knows of no reason for the recent rise in its stock price. "There are no corporate or business developments, announced or unannounced," the company said in a statement. "Business is continuing as usual," it said, adding that it is not engaged in any merger or acquisition discussions. The company's stock is trading up 2-1/8 points at 14-1/4. Honeybee said it plans to release later this month preliminary financial results for the year ended January 30. Reuter
